message: CRITICAL BLOCKER: Build phase has zero deliverables. The phase description is 'Build feature' but no feature was built. Empty findings/ and output/ directories confirm no work was performed. Phase duration was only 5 seconds before submission for review.

data.expected_deliverables: Feature implementation with code artifacts, tests, and documentation
data.actual_deliverables: None - this appears to be a test of the review system itself
data.review_implication: Cannot approve a build phase with no build output
